Institute-name: IIT Hyderabad and Anna University Chennai
content: Corporates are using different kinds of contemporary teams like virtual teams, human-robot teams and agile teams. Students need to understand and be familiar with these new kinds of teams, as well as develop a new set of competencies and skills to work in these teams. In this course, we introduce students to the concept of contemporary teams. We introduce the challenges that members of such team will face and how to deal with the challenges
